Legislative History of Laws

For Law 16-71, see notes following ยง 7-751.01.

DC CODE ยง 7-751.03

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Department of Health shall administer the Program and shall:
Certify a list of acceptable service obligation sites on an annual basis and make the list publically available;
Conduct regular surveys to ensure participant compliance with the Program;
Administer any other functions necessary to the Program.
The Department of Health reserves the right to conduct regular inspections to ensure that all service obligations sites meet the definition as set forth in ยง 7-751.01(9).

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)
